channel.title: Problem with logging into MoparScape
channel.description:
This could mean the server is down, but I'm not sure.
When I try to log into MoparScape as my Tester account, I always get this message:
[code][09:21:06] Logging into (Tester, *****) [09:21:06] Your UID is: 78690024 Server: ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:2696 Registering user tester with pass testpass Server: hybridscape Server (2): Exception! Server: ClientHandler: Client tester disconnected. [09:21:08] [09:21:08] Logging into (Tester, *****) [09:21:08] Your UID is: 78690024 Server: ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:2697 Did not save for tester Server: ClientHandler: Client tester disconnected.[/code]
Sometimes when I click Start Server, it says something about 43594 being in use.
One question, when I get a message saying "Cannot log onto server. Must be down." is that a problem at my end or with something else? Even when I'm not running a server, just playing by myself.

item.title: Problem with logging into MoparScape
item.dc:creator: @Fir3_Flam3 Fir3 Flam3
item.description:
@Fir3_Flam3 wrote:

This could mean the server is down, but I’m not sure.

When I try to log into MoparScape as my Tester account, I always get this message:

[09:21:06] Logging into (Tester, *****) [09:21:06] Your UID is: 78690024 Server: ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:2696 Registering user tester with pass testpass Server: hybridscape Server (2): Exception! Server: ClientHandler: Client tester disconnected. [09:21:08] [09:21:08] Logging into (Tester, *****) [09:21:08] Your UID is: 78690024 Server: ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:2697 Did not save for tester Server: ClientHandler: Client tester disconnected.

Sometimes when I click Start Server, it says something about 43594 being in use.

One question, when I get a message saying “Cannot log onto server. Must be down.” is that a problem at my end or with something else? Even when I’m not running a server, just playing by myself.
